<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Confirm carrier shipment settlement"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/shipment/{shipmentReference}/settlement/confirm"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This will confirm the carrier shipment settlement. This is equivalent of posting a "final" shipment carrier settlement

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
